Parking

The Hilton has parking but it is quite expensive. Central Parking is a block away and their site says they have a daily max of $4.

Frontend Tooling Workshop

The workshop will be at the Hilton downtown.

Hilton St. Petersburg Bayfront

333 1st St S
St Petersburg, FL 33701

The Plan

Registration begins at 8:30am, the fun begins at 9. There will be table seating, with power. While there won't be hands-on coding, you'll want your laptops for pulling repos, checking out sites, and possibly some of the apps that you'll see throughout the day.

Food and Drinks

There will be small food items available at all of the breaks as well as a light lunch. Breakfast will be muffins, breads, breakfast sandwiches. Breaks will have fruit and various yummies. Lunch will be a Florida Cobb salad with chicken. There are some great restaurants within walking distance as well.

Questions?

If you have any questions, please just reply with them.
See you next week!
Dan
